mapper.insert: insert into T_AGGZTJ_DQ_3( DWMC, DWJCWPZ_JCJS, AJSLWPZ_JCJS, DWYHWPZ_JCJS, AJYHWPZ_JCJS, WSYHWPZ_JCJS, WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS, WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS, AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID ) values ( #{DWMC}, #{DWJCWPZ_JCJS}, #{AJSLWPZ_JCJS}, #{DWYHWPZ_JCJS}, #{AJYHWPZ_JCJS}, #{WSYHWPZ_JCJS}, #{WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS}, #{WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS}, #{AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID} )
mapper.update: update T_AGGZTJ_DQ_3 set DWMC = #{DWMC}, DWJCWPZ_JCJS = #{DWJCWPZ_JCJS}, AJSLWPZ_JCJS = #{AJSLWPZ_JCJS}, DWYHWPZ_JCJS = #{DWYHWPZ_JCJS}, AJYHWPZ_JCJS = #{AJYHWPZ_JCJS}, WSYHWPZ_JCJS = #{WSYHWPZ_JCJS}, WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS = #{WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS}, WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS = #{WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS}, AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID = AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID where AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID = #{AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID}
mapper.select: select DWMC, DWJCWPZ_JCJS, AJSLWPZ_JCJS, DWYHWPZ_JCJS, AJYHWPZ_JCJS, WSYHWPZ_JCJS, WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS, WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS, AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID from T_AGGZTJ_DQ_3 where AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID = #{AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID}
select a.DWMC, a.DWJCWPZ_JCJS, a.AJSLWPZ_JCJS, a.DWYHWPZ_JCJS, a.AJYHWPZ_JCJS, a.WSYHWPZ_JCJS, a.WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS, a.WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS, a.AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID from T_AGGZTJ_DQ_3 a
select a.DWMC, a.DWJCWPZ_JCJS, a.AJSLWPZ_JCJS, a.DWYHWPZ_JCJS, a.AJYHWPZ_JCJS, a.WSYHWPZ_JCJS, a.WSZDSPJSWPZ_JCJS, a.WSQYJSWPZ_JCJS, a.AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID from T_AGGZTJ_DQ_3 a
mapper.delete:
delete from T_AGGZTJ_DQ_3 where AGGZTJ_DQ_3_ID in
#{item}
mapper.select: select t.dwmc,t.dwjcbz,t.dwjc from v_dwjccy t where t.dwbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YHSL_ID}),'%')
select t.dwmc,t.yhlxmc,t.dwjcbz,t.dwjc,t.yhjcbz,t.yhjc from T_DWYHWPZ t where t.dwbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YHSL_ID}),'%') order by t.dwbm,t.yhlx
SELECT dwmc,ywmc,ajlbmc,slbh,slmc,sllb,slwz,fpwz,sfsdfl,sfsdfp,lcmbmc,lcclfs,lcclqk,flfs,sfzdqdcbr,zdqdcbrsj from T_AJSLWPZHBZ t WHERE t.dwbm= #{YHSL_ID} order by ajlbbm,slbh,dwmc
select ywmc,ajmc,ajlbsxmc from T_AJYHWPZ where dwbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YHSL_ID}),'%') order by ajbm
select ywmc,wsbm,wsmc,wsjh from T_WSYHWPZ where dwbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YHSL_ID}),'%') order by ywbm,wsbm
select ywmc,wsbm,wsmc,wszdspjs from T_WSZDSPJSWPZ where dwbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YHSL_ID}),'%') order by wszdspjs,ywbm,wsbm
select ywmc,wsbm,wsmc from T_WSQYJSWPZ where dwbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YHSL_ID}),'%') order by ywbm,wsbm
SELECT dwmc,ywmc,ajlbmc,slbh,slmc,sllb,slwz,fpwz,sfsdfl,sfsdfp,lcmbmc,lcclfs,lcclqk,flfs,sfzdqdcbr,zdqdcbrsj from T_AJSLWPZ t WHERE t.dwbm='slpzbz2' order by ajlbbm,slbh,dwbm
SELECT dwmc,ywmc,ajlbmc,slbh,slmc,sllb,slwz,fpwz,sfsdfl,sfsdfp,lcmbmc,lcclfs,lcclqk,flfs,sfzdqdcbr,zdqdcbrsj from T_AJSLWPZ t WHERE t.dwbm='slpzbz3' order by ajlbbm,slbh,dwbm
SELECT dwmc,ywmc,ajlbmc,slbh,slmc,sllb,slwz,fpwz,sfsdfl,sfsdfp,lcmbmc,lcclfs,lcclqk,flfs,sfzdqdcbr,zdqdcbrsj from T_AJSLWPZ t WHERE t.dwbm='slpzbz4' order by ajlbbm,slbh,dwbm
